value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral CHEESES MaxPax?! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between MaxPax (Protoss) and Serral (Zerg). A variety of games in this series, with a heavy macro focus and some cheese. value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral Plays The BROOD LORD Micro Trick! (Cure vs Serral)
value.excerpt: Long macro game of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral, the current SC2 World Champion, and Cure. In this match Cure decides to open up with a Terran turtle style. value.title: StarCraft 2: The ZERG's Command Center! (Viewer Game)
